title: Recept na Petriho filtr
content:
Recept na Petriho filtr

Petriho filtr: augments the intensity of all Signs.

This scroll contains the formula for Petriho filtr, a potion which augments the intensity of all znamení.

Zápisy do Deníku

Receptury: Petriho filtr

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
100  	20  




Lokace
A crate (or trunk) in the fisstech lab in the Salamandra hideout in the stoky
Hrobař at the same time as the key to the cemetery gate
Poustevník
Kalkstein, ve Staré Wyzimě
